amendatorysection.para: (1) Adopt and promulgate rules and regulations, including a uniform system of classification of Parkinson's disease which is consistent with medically and clinically accepted standards and definitions for use in reporting by medical personnel treating the disease;
(2) Execute any contracts that the department deems necessary to carry out the Parkinson's Disease Registry Act;
(3) Receive and record the data obtained from reports filed under sections 81-6,102 and 81-6,103; and
(4) Comply with all necessary requirements to obtain funds or grants.
